analyzed: milindapañha
meṇḍakapañha
paṇāmita vagga
rukkha acetanā bhāva pañha
bhante nāgasena tathāgatena
acetanam brāhmaṇa
jāno a jānantam imam palāsa
āraddha vīriyaḥ dhuvam appamatto
sukhaseyyam pucchasi kissa hetu uti
punar ca bhaṇita
iti
tāvade ajjhabhāsatha
mayham pi vacanaṃ atthi
bhāradvāja suṇohi mā iti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, rukkho acetano, tena hi phandanena rukkhena bhāradvājena saha sallapitanti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena rukkhaḥ acetano tena hi phandanena rukkhena bhāradvājena saha yam tam micchā

original: Yadi phandanena rukkhena bhāradvājena saddhiṁ sallapitaṁ, tena hi rukkho acetanoti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi phandanena rukkhena bhāradvājena saddhim tena hi rukkhaḥ acetanoti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘rukkho acetano’ti, phandanena ca rukkhena bhāradvājena saddhiṁ sallapitaṁ, tañca pana vacanaṁ lokasamaññāya bhaṇitaṁ.
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā rukkho acetanoti phandanena ca rukkhena bhāradvājena saddhim tat ca pana vacanam loka samaññāya bhaṇita

original: Natthi, mahārāja, acetanassa rukkhassa sallāpo nāma, api ca, mahārāja, tasmiṁ rukkhe
analyzed: natthi mahā rāja acetanassa rukkhassa sallāpaḥ nāma api ca mahā rāja tasmin rukkhe

original: adhivatthāya devatāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatīti cesā lokapaṇṇatti,
analyzed: adhivatthāya devatāya itam adhivacanam rukkho ti rukkho sallapati iti ca isā loka paṇṇatti

original: yathā, mahārāja, sakaṭaṁ dhaññassa paripūritaṁ dhaññasakaṭanti jano voharati, na
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sakaṭam dhaññassa paripūritam dhañña sakaṭanti janaḥ voharati na

original: ca taṁ dhaññamayaṁ sakaṭaṁ, rukkhamayaṁ sakaṭaṁ, tasmiṁ sakaṭe dhaññassa pana ākiritattā
analyzed: ca tam dhañña mayam sakaṭa rukkha mayam sakaṭa tasmin sakaṭe dhaññassa pana ākirita ttā
janaḥ voharati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano, yā pana tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā, tassāyeva taṁ adhivacanaṁ rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatīti cesā lokapaṇṇatti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja na rukkhaḥ sallapati rukkhaḥ acetanaḥ yā pana tasmin rukkhe adhivatthā devatā tassāya eva tam adhivacanam rukkho ti rukkho sallapati iti ca isā loka paṇṇatti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, dadhiṁ manthayamāno takkaṁ manthemīti voharati, na taṁ takkaṁ, yaṁ so mantheti, dadhiṁyeva so manthento takkaṁ manthemīti voharati;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja dadhim manthayamānaḥ takkam manthemi iti voharati na tam takka yam saḥ mantheti dadhiyā iva saḥ manthentaḥ takkam manthemi iti voharati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja na rukkhaḥ sallapati rukkhaḥ acetanaḥ

original: Yā pana tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā, tassāyeva taṁ adhivacanaṁ rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatīti cesā lokapaṇṇatti.
analyzed: yā pana tasmin rukkhe adhivatthā devatā tassāya eva tam adhivacanam rukkho ti rukkho sallapati iti ca isā loka paṇṇatti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, asantaṁ sādhetukāmo santaṁ sādhemīti voharati, asiddhaṁ siddhanti voharati, evamesā lokasamaññā;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja asantam sādhetu kāmo santam sādhemi iti voharati asiddham siddhanti voharati evam esā loka samaññā

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja na rukkhaḥ sallapati rukkhaḥ acetanaḥ

original: Yā pana tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā, tassāyeva taṁ adhivacanaṁ rukkhoti, rukkho
analyzed: yā pana tasmin rukkhe adhivatthā devatā tassāya eva tam adhivacanam rukkho ti rukkho

original: sallapatīti cesā lokapaṇṇatti, yāya, mahārāja, lokasamaññāya jano voharati, tathāgatopi
analyzed: sallapati iti ca isā loka paṇṇatti yāya mahā rāja loka samaññāya janaḥ voharati tathāgataḥ api
tāya iva loka samaññāya sattānam dhammam deseti iti
sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti
rukkha acetanā bhāva pañhaḥ pañcamaḥ
